I love that Maokai on the far left.
Nah Rammus just looks {{champion:33}} OK.

Kennen looks so done.

(Also I hate to be that guy but I'm gonna do it anyway - that's holly, not mistletoe. Holly = red berries and spiky leaves, mistletoe = smaller white berries with long/round leaves. Everyone makes this mistake for some reason.)
today i learned...
themoreyouknow.gif
As did I...
Indeed. Mistletoe {{champion:7}}  also got this one wrong.

Heh, I love how Kat seems to be looking at Garen,
like she knows what up. d:
Kennen is like "kill me now"

um I hate to say it but ez and lux  this is weird 
reason 1- they look close enough to be twins
reason 2- ezreal is gay... with taric....

Common, this is cute.
Also, Ezreal was born in Piltover and Lux was born in Damacia.
If you should know, that was just a fan fiction. Ezreal + Taric was an unstoppable pair some seasons ago 
Also, in LoL lore; Ezreal and Lux had a hidden relationship.
Not trying to be ugly though.

Why isn't Gentlemen {{champion:31}} and Gentlelady {{champion:421}} not there! Oh wait they are probably outside since they ARE the size of the house (Cho'Gath can be bigger though)

And also how {{champion:55}}  is having a giggle at {{champion:86}} 's expense...

The Azir one really gets me. Azir really has the holiday spirit.

The present is given!
Eventually, the snow claim us all.
None know the meaning of Christmas better than I.
The slumbering children must awaken!
What is Christmas, but the most wonderful time of year?
My elves march on!

And that of course makes Xerath the Grinch. And his spark grew three sizes that match.
I logged in just to vote AND your summoner name made me laugh so hard IRL. You win my interwebs today sir.

King poro Gnar
i woke up and logged in, and riot had given me a skin for good behavior in 2014. Just wanted to say thanks, also it was a skin that i actually really wanted, so thanks riot. look forward to 2015.

Riot you know what you should make? Re-Gifted {{champion:6}}, I am not sure if anyone wants wants him as a gift anyways. But still the skins  he has (besides Battle Cast) are the grossest things ever.
Riot I still have not gotten Mystery Gifted yet by you D:
MERRY SHURIMA

I was actually working on a Winter Wonder Orianna sculpture and put in a fish bowl. But.... my oven messed up! it turned the hit up by itself to 0, it would have been better if it went backwards, but it went forward, adding mor heat, turning my sculpture into a dark smelly bloaty rubbery object T.T I gave up. Next time I'm baking a sculpture, I will make sure that this won't happen again, and will hopefully able to show my work.

Anyway! I love these fanarts wow! those Winter Wonder Orianna drawings melts m heart into water (Yes I have a frozen heart).

Back on December 21st a bunch of cosplayers from Calgary, Alberta, Canada got together to do a winter themed photoshoot and video shoot. I'm in it as Christmas Ezreal! :D 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3AetKC-ifqA
UR SO CUTE
THANK YOU!! :D
